ygData.subject: RE: trade question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Forgive me if this was covered already but at level 43 I m STILL using the shard. Sol A and Sol B are full of creatures that have high fire resist so you
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michal Hobson [mailto:given@...]

> Anyway, just to correct a post someone made yesterday or the day before:
> The Obsidian Scimitar has no proc but is + 6 AGI or DEX (I forget which)
> The Obsidian Shard has the proc - which is resisted WAY too much in my
> opinion, so if you get one, don't expect it to become the uber-poker you
> thought it could be hehe. I personally was very disappointed.

Forgive me if this was covered already but at level 43 I'm STILL using the
shard.

Sol A and Sol B are full of creatures that have high fire resist so you
should be aware that those two zones the Shard won't be as useful, but I've
found taht the closer to green the kobolds are in Sol B, the less the shard
is resisted. I hardly ever get resists in guk or outdoor zones. This is a
great weapon because of the proc, especially when combined with an ugly
stick. Since my regular group doesn't have an every day tank, I have to be
ready to do enough damage to take a beating and this is hte best combo I've
found.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 43 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
